abstract: T. Boone Pickens, the 80-year-old oil magnate who has been grabbing headlines in recent weeks for his support of wind energy, is a man with a plan, apparently.
lead_paragraph: T. Boone Pickens, the 80-year-old oil magnate who has been grabbing headlines in recent weeks for his support of wind energy, is a man with a plan, apparently.

headline.main: For Pickens, His Plan Is Better than None at All
